title: A 4K ultra-realistic portrait
prompt: A 4K ultra-realistic portrait of a young girl, framed from the chest up (not full body), designed for Instagram story or profile picture. The background is a luxurious Persian red carpet design (only behind her, not on the ground). Sunlight shines from one side,casting natural warm light across half of her face. She is wearing an elegant dress inspired by Persian carpet patterns,with authentic Iranian colors and motifs. Her facial features remain unchanged.She is holding a Persian cat in her hands
